headline.main: R.A.F. HITS BASES OF AXIS IN GREEGE; Strikes to Block Any Move Against Britain's Power in the Mediterranean SUBMARINE DEPOT BOMBED Arms and Chemical Plants, Oil Facilities and Airfield Also Raiders' Targets

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 1 (AP) -- Great Britain's powerful bombing forces in the Middle East were carrying the war to the Axis tonight with sustained assaults on the German bases in Greece, where there is increasing evidence of preparations for an air and sea assault on Britain's Eastern Mediterranean Fleet.
